I think I've fixed the problem :).  I wasn't doing what ExperimentRun::fini=
shEvaluations() does.  In particular, I think making the call to population=
->adjustFitness() is what did the trick.  In any case, it looks like I have=
 offspring being produced, so that's tremendous progress!
